EmailTemplate.name: Level 2 Alert for Execution
EmailTemplate.subject: Level 2 Alert -- Execution for "{!Account.Name}"
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Account.00N20000002FnOM},
The execution for the entity {!Account.Name} has crossed more than 5 days but the Execution hasn't been completed yet.
Please accomplish your task as early as possible.
Regards, ComplianceTeam.
